researchExperience.title: Development and Validation of a Novel Airborne Photon-Counting LiDAR for Coastal Mapping
researchExperience.description: Conducted R&D on a novel, lightweight photon-counting LiDAR system for UAV-based integrated coastal and bathymetric mapping. Proposed a new Scanning Geometry and Density Weighted Filter (SGDWF) algorithm to enhance signal extraction in noisy coastal environments.
publications: Manuscript submitted to Geophysical Research Letters
achievements: Developed the SGDWF algorithm to efficiently isolate signal photons from background noise in complex coastal settings
Validated system performance at Bei Reef, China, achieving high-accuracy bathymetry with R² up to 0.990 and RMSE as low as 0.217 m against reference data

researchExperience.title: A Novel Refraction Correction Method for Airborne Photon-Counting LiDAR Bathymetry
researchExperience.description: Addressed the challenge of water refraction in nearshore bathymetry using the GeologyObserver-1 photon-counting LiDAR system. Developed a rigorous refraction-correction method incorporating a partition-area JONSWAP wave model to significantly improve measurement accuracy.
publications: Manuscript submitted to Geophysical Research Letters
achievements: Proposed and implemented a novel refraction-correction model using a partition-area JONSWAP approach to quantify and correct depth-dependent displacement
Demonstrated notable improvement in bathymetric accuracy post-correction, achieving best-case results of 0.203 m RMSE, 0.992 R², and a slope of 0.988 in the study area
